44a3c4c5-7bc6-506e-a1f5-205000611e3f.title: Document Title: ITP-001-AX-LOT-XXX - WRSB Install - CH XXXXXX - CH XXXXXX

89c9d249-b89d-5de4-92d7-b86c9c0c3159.title: ITP approved for use by: Beakal Likassa

1b8c1042-8b92-5947-a0ab-e236d129974d.title: ITP Description: Supply & Installation of Wire Rope Safety Barrier

143aa128-8d1d-51a7-815d-26faf69c09c1.title: Frequency: Min 14 days prior to commencing

261af606-6ac6-5eeb-a94a-03dfd49b3bec.title: Reference Documents: Project Specific Specification PS3090.06 (c) VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.05

7fc39d97-e348-509d-bf21-3010ab3d28f8.title: Acceptance Criteria: Only Safety barrier products listed in VicRoads Road Design Note 06-04 shall be used. The installation of the WRSB shall not proceed until the signed statement and certificates of compliance have been accepted by the Superintendent.

1facde0e-eae5-5e66-b9c8-88c039533253.title: Record of Conformity: Material Test Certificates

3a4b91e7-2c74-563c-950a-7997961e7733.title: Reference Documents: VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.04 Cl.711.11

8689205a-5424-529a-8310-6f7d49d3bee8.title: Record of Conformity: Data Sheets, Visual Inspection

8901bacb-2c7f-5e2b-b0df-13315fb58c27.title: Acceptance Criteria: WRSB material shall meet the requirements as specified in VicRoads Section Cl.711.04.

53c49dc2-6289-579a-8e89-20e9fd79763b.title: Reference Documents: Project Specific Specification PS3090.07 (b) VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.15 (a) VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.07(iii)

0f4bde40-6a5f-579d-aba9-6872e57837ec.title: Acceptance Criteria: Concrete Mix is Registered with VicRoads. Concrete mix meets strength, grade, and maximum aggregate size as detailed on drawings. Where the soil is solid well compacted in situ material as agreed by the Superintendent, the crushed rock can be omitted and a minimum 100 mm depth of N20 strength grade concrete placed for the maintenance strip.

cd7e66d0-a752-5e79-a566-2fc36722e276.title: Record of Conformity: Mix design approval

a85f3a95-422f-5859-848a-4f2ec50fcb70.title: Record of Conformity: Latest Revision Drawings

d4db3a30-e8da-5a86-b2cd-6d343482ce67.title: Reference Documents: Project Drawings / Drawing Register Quality Management Plan

ad07cb90-6794-5b2a-8de3-b6bb1667adf9.title: Acceptance Criteria: Check the revision of the IFC drawings are current as per the drawing register (on Teambinder)

2ca642e7-3596-5f92-bff5-746de7037769.title: Reference Documents: IFC Drawings VR 711.08 VR 711.07 (c)

128e4162-b9a1-5cee-ae46-d38204aa7de6.title: Acceptance Criteria: Survey activities undertaken to ensure and validate that all Works meet level and location requirements within the tolerances as per cl. 711.08. The WRSB shall not be installed until the set out alignment of the posts has been reviewed and accepted by the Superintendent.

cc052449-102a-5626-9b19-f99ff7b2c2ab.title: Acceptance Criteria: Anchor blocks and post foundations shall not be constructed until the design and manufacturer’s acceptance has been reviewed by the Superintendent. Anchor blocks and post foundation shall not be cast until inspected by the Superintendent.

ee79af66-6cc3-518d-aa8e-cba734b87962.title: Record of Conformity: This signed ITP

3d812342-e588-5fe9-94d9-218073bc84a4.title: Acceptance Criteria: Each wire rope shall be tensioned in accordance with the relationship between rope tension and ambient temperature, applicable to the proprietary WRSB system as per the manufacturer’s specification.

08d2d723-1188-5b5f-a4ec-c58292443c43.title: Record of Conformity: This signed ITP

0b149d4e-3bab-52ed-b76f-ca723ac7ab59.title: Reference Documents: WR-STD-064, WR-STD-050 VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.08

bcc51b57-844a-58ca-96ba-c2f0195ed7c0.title: Acceptance Criteria: Tolerances for construction of the WRSB system shall be in accordance with the lesser of the manufacturer’s specification or as follows: (a) vertical tolerance on the height of the WRSB shall be ± 20 mm from the design line (b) longitudinal line tolerance for the WRSB system shall be ± 20 mm in plan view (c) tolerance on post spacing shall be ± 25 mm. WRSB height shall be measured from the road pavement when it is located within 1.5 m of the edge of pavement. For distances beyond 1.5 m, the WRSB height shall be measured from the ground surface at its location.

c04844f1-3333-543b-8118-a394eb380aef.title: Reference Documents: Project Specific Specification PS3090.07 (b) VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.15 (a)

e64be0ab-ed55-5275-bff3-9bbe856d7318.title: Acceptance Criteria: Maintenance Strip beneath WRSB and terminals as indicated on drawing and/or as nominated in Table 711.151. The concrete maintenance strip shall be - Placed parallel to the barrier & have min 300 mm clearance to WRSB post. - min 2% crossfall or same slope as abutting pavement - Shall be constructed flush with the adjacent ground level - Shall be min 75mm N20 concrete conforming to the requirements of clause 711.04(b) - Shall rest on min 75 mm of compacted Class 3 crushed rock. Crushed rock may be omitted and substituted for min 100mm depth N20 strength grade concrete subject to Superintendent approval. Dummy joints at least 20 mm deep and 5 mm wide shall be formed at 2 m intervals across the full width of the concrete maintenance strip. Expansion joints shall be placed at intervals not exceeding 12 m.

a755b66b-fb79-5f6c-a30b-a35c723403dc.title: Record of Conformity: SCP & Test Report

543eac0f-474d-593d-be15-a5daa3b82fc0.title: Acceptance Criteria: Survey activities undertaken to ensure and validate that all works meet level and location requirements. The establishment and integrity of the survey network shall be verified before commencing any survey and setout activity. IFC and latest available revision used.

35462a83-eb0b-5071-883a-c55061957cd4.title: Reference Documents: Project Spec. Cl.1190.06 Latest IFC Drawings

696dd966-d33a-532f-9cae-567c8b66bc54.title: Record of Conformity: Survey records & pegs on the ground

0081171e-9f14-52a5-86f4-09730f4d9ffd.title: Acceptance Criteria: Concrete shall be N20 standard strength grade. Sampling and testing of the strength of the concrete shall be carried out. One sample shall be taken for every 50m3 of concrete poured for each strength placed on any one day. Test to include: - 1 x 7 day compressive strength - 2 x 28 day compressive strength - 1 x Slump Test

c2fc9032-4399-55d9-87a6-a6e663b64921.title: Acceptance Criteria: Concrete shall be cured either by water curing, wet hessian,polyethlyene sheeting adequately sealed against moisture losses, curing compound or combination thereof. Curing compounds to be in accordance with AS3799.

e0adb039-04a6-5f95-a0ba-f1321fb525c2.title: Record of Conformity: Certificate of Compliance for each treatment installed Product and Installation Manual

38379f04-aa0b-5bbe-9d14-ef4ed60cbdd6.title: Frequency: Prior the issue of the Certificate of Practical Completion

d1806129-eb75-5235-96bb-d6f2e86f8965.title: Acceptance Criteria: Prior to the issue of the Certificate of Practical Completion, FH shall arrange for a safety barrier compliance audit on all WRSB installations constructed under the Contract. A signed copy of the manufacturer’s Installation Checklist / Inspection and Test Plan as per the manufacturer’s Product and Installation Manual shall be completed and submitted to the Superintendent..

48ad9b80-30f5-5828-b389-c4e201204727.title: Reference Documents: VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.09 Project Specific Specification PS3090.07(f)

meta.name: 5.1 - Compliance Audit of Barrier System Installation

6f8c32d0-23d5-5fc5-b77d-c2998e86a609.title: Acceptance Criteria: delineators shall be fastened to the WRSB system, comprising post caps fitted with 50 x 100 mm Class 1A retro-reflective material, as defined in AS/NZS 1906.2, or placed on the front top of the post above the wire ropes. Delineators shall be installed at approximately 12.5 to 15 m spacing. Delineators shall not be placed on flared sections. The delineators shall be arranged so that vehicles approaching from either direction at night will only see: - Red delineators on the left side of one-way and two-way roadways - White delineators on the right side of two-way roadways - yellow delineators on the right side of one- way roadways Delineators not to be installed when the WRSB offset if greater than 4m from the traffic lane.

bfd2e4ee-3bd9-51e2-95bc-7b4a0795c673.title: Frequency: Once installation of assets completed.

7497a787-06fb-55e2-bab3-54d094e1cc45.title: Acceptance Criteria: 7 day compressive strength to comply with table 610.051 for early indication that the strength is tracking correctly. 28 day compressive strength (average of the 2 no. cylinders) per sample comply with the design strength. Note: 1 of the 2 no. 28 day cylinders per sample may be as low as 90% of the required strength, so long as the average meets the required strength.

a09fff8f-c56f-54b4-9419-ff2f6729039a.title: Record of Conformity: Compressive Strength Test Results

e94ba2ae-1212-5592-ab74-b87c61adfde3.title: Acceptance Criteria: Provide record of dimensional measurements to demonstrate concrete members comply with tolerances as per 711.08 as applicable to the element.
